tool_description: This API provides on a monthly basis, the global mean surface temperature anomaly from 1880.04 to the present (in celsius).
title: Global temperature

api_list.name: temperatureEndpoint
api_list.description: The response will be an object with no CORS resources enabled.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://global-temperature.p.rapidapi.com/api/temperature-api"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "global-temperature.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
